amendment.description: To require up-to-date employment data for waivers of work requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 102 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 102 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S1890-1892) To require up-to-date employment data for waivers of work requirements.
